attributes.action: Prosecute county lines gangs with child sexual activity when children plug drugs
attributes.additional_details: To encourage organised criminal gangs not to do this to young people. A sexual offence charge  as well as a drugs charge may reduce this from happening
attributes.background: Charge organised crime gang members under 2003 Sexual Offences Act when a child under 16 reports that they were told/forced or coerced to plug drugs on their anus or vagina

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Decisions on prosecutions are a matter for the police, CPS, and the courts.
